GetEnemiesCount.comment: Returns a count of the enemy ships.

GetRelativeAngle.comment: Returns an angle between your ship and given enemy ship.

GetDistance.comment: Returns distance between your ship and given enemy ship.

Shoot.comment: Shoots a rocket (if ammo is available).

GetCurrentSpeed.comment: Returns current speed of your ship.

GetCurrentAngle.comment: Returns a current angle of your ship (relative to north).

SetTargetSpeed.comment: Sets a target speed of your ship.

SetTargetAngle.comment: Sets a target angle of your ship
